TEXT.English: Radioactive dust fills the skies near %s1_CityName!
TEXT.French: *Hiver nucléaire* Alerte ! Réchauffement planétaire près de %s1_CityName !
TEXT.German: *Kernwinter* Nahe der Stadt %s1_CityName zeigen sich Auswirkungen der globalen Erwärmung!
TEXT.Italian: *Inverno nucleare* Gli effetti del riscaldamento globale colpiscono %s1_CityName!
TEXT.Spanish: *Invierno nuclear* El calentamiento global causa efecto cerca de %s1_CityName.

TEXT.English: Global warming can raise sea level.
TEXT.French: Le rechauffement global peut soulever le niveau de la mer.
TEXT.German: Die globale Erwarmung kann Meeresspiegel anheben.
TEXT.Italian: Il riscaldamento globale puo sollevare il livello del mare.
TEXT.Spanish: El calentamiento del planeta puede levantar nivel del mar.

TEXT.English: Worldwide pollution has reached the sustainability threshold.
TEXT.French: Worldwide pollution has reached the sustainability threshold.
TEXT.German: Worldwide pollution has reached the sustainability threshold.
TEXT.Italian: Worldwide pollution has reached the sustainability threshold.
TEXT.Spanish: Worldwide pollution has reached the sustainability threshold.

TEXT.English: Our scientists have theorized that if worldwide pollution output continues to increase, we may be faced with irreversible climate change. We have appointed an environmental advisor to provide you with further information. (See the economics screen; F2)
